about.author: Giantapp Man
about.reminder: (Reminder: Current Version is a Test Version: Expect Bugs. When Providing Feedback, Please Describe Reproduction Steps Clearly, Avoid Pure Emotional Outbursts)

common.feedbackPrompt: You've been using this version for a while now. Any issues or feedback you'd like to share with the developers?
common.importanceOfFeedback: Your positive feedback is crucial to us.

hub.download_wallpaper_with_v2: You can download wallpapers with Version2 first
hub.membership_upgrade_to_v3: Pro of Version2 can upgrade to Version3 for free later
hub.set_same_directory_for_wallpapers_2_and_: Set the wallpaper directories for 2 and 3 to be the same

local.apply_screen_effect: Click to make the screen {0} take effect
local.apply_to_all_screens: Click to apply to all screens
local.click_to_import_or_drag_file_here: Click to import or drag the file here
local.confirm_delete: This will permanently delete the file and it cannot be recovered. Confirm deletion?
local.delete_failed: Failed to delete wallpaper, please try again
local.disable_cpu_consumption: When enabled, GPU consumption; when disabled, CPU consumption
local.empty_wallpaper_not_allowed_in_list_mode: In list mode, the wallpaper cannot be empty
local.enable_mouse_events: Enable mouse events; disabling allows mouse passthrough
local.failed_to_get_current_wallpaper: Failed to get the currently playing wallpaper
local.failed_to_get_wallpaper_list: Failed to get the wallpaper list
local.failed_to_load_video: Failed to load the video. This happens occasionally and there is no solution for now. Close the window and try again, or you can ignore it and just save it directly.
local.failed_to_open_wallpaper_folder: Failed to open the wallpaper folder
local.fit_description: This option will affect all screens
local.fit_mode: Choose a fit for your desktop image
local.local_list_description: Local list, only saved on your local machine
local.local_wallpaper_description: Local wallpaper, only saved on your local machine
local.not_saved_confirm_close: Not saved, are you sure you want to close?
local.setting_parameters: Set the parameters of the wallpaper
local.stretch_image_description: Turn on the stretch of the picture, turn off to keep the original ratio
local.you_can_create_wallpaper: You can create a wallpaper or modify the wallpaper scan directory.
local.keep_wallpaper_description: Keep the wallpaper after exiting the software
local.video_player_description: It is recommended to use Mpv player to support more video formats. But if you feel stuck, you can try switching to the system player.
